title: Fort Smith National Historic Site: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar       News Releases          Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 1 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Fort Smith National Historic Site Tai Chi in the Park      Time: 10:00 AM to 11:15 AM Location: Park grounds in good weather; indoors in bad weather Fees: Free      Saturday, September 10, 2016 Every Saturday Weekly  from 09/10/2016 to 10/29/2016 The National Park Service is proud to partner with instructor Cindy Cole to offer 8 weeks of free weekly classes in Tai Chi.
